span.span: Returns the name of the key associated with the value passed by reference.
A null reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在被派生类重写，以便返回与关联的密钥名称`value`参数。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class in order to return the name of the key associated with the `value` parameter. 默认实现返回 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default implementation returns null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 只能通过此类或派生的类可访问此受保护的方法。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
